20110104184357.000|20110104184357.000|CC1|  to help significantly improve 
20110104184357.000|20110104184400.000|CC1|         lung function.

20110104184402.000|20110104184405.000|CC1|    both an anti-inflammatory   
20110104184405.000|20110104184405.000|CC1|        and a long-acting       
20110104184405.000|20110104184406.000|CC1|         bronchodilator,        
20110104184406.000|20110104184408.000|CC1|        working together        
20110104184408.000|20110104184408.000|CC1|         to help improve        
20110104184408.000|20110104184410.000|CC1|   your lung function all day.  
20110104184410.000|20110104184410.000|CC1|      ADVAIR won't replace      
20110104184410.000|20110104184412.000|CC1|      fast-acting inhalers      
20110104184412.000|20110104184414.000|CC1|       for sudden symptoms      
20110104184414.000|20110104184414.000|CC1|     and should not be used     
20110104184414.000|20110104184416.000|CC1|     more than twice a day.     
20110104184416.000|20110104184416.000|CC1|        People with COPD        
20110104184416.000|20110104184418.000|CC1|          taking ADVAIR         
20110104184418.000|20110104184418.000|CC1|        may have a higher       
20110104184418.000|20110104184420.000|CC1|      chance of pneumonia.      
20110104184420.000|20110104184420.000|CC1|    ADVAIR may increase your    
20110104184420.000|20110104184423.000|CC1|      risk of osteoporosis      
20110104184423.000|20110104184424.000|CC1|     and some eye problems.     
20110104184424.000|20110104184424.000|CC1|  Tell your doctor if you have  
20110104184424.000|20110104184426.000|CC1|        a heart condition

20110104184747.000|20110104184748.000|CC1|SECRET?                         
20110104184748.000|20110104184749.000|CC1|>> THERE ARE FEW THINGS THAT I  
20110104184749.000|20110104184750.000|CC1|SEE THAT ARE MORE DEVASTATING   
20110104184750.000|20110104184751.000|CC1|THAN HAIR LOSS.

20110104184752.000|20110104184753.000|CC1|BEAUTIFUL WOMAN, AND AS SOON AS

20110104184801.000|20110104184803.000|CC1|SIGNIFICANT HAIR LOSS.

20110104184845.000|20110104184845.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:46:00 of 1:00:00
20110104184845.000|20110104184847.000|CC1|SO THERE'S ONE CALLED TELOGEN   
20110104184847.000|20110104184848.000|CC1|EFFLUVIUM SCALP.                
20110104184848.000|20110104184850.000|CC1|THIS IS NOT A TRUE HAIR         
20110104184850.000|20110104184852.000|CC1|LOSS.                           
20110104184852.000|20110104184853.000|CC1|IT'S REALLY HAIR SHEDDING WHERE 
20110104184853.000|20110104184855.000|CC1|THREE OR SO MONTHS AFTER A      
20110104184855.000|20110104184856.000|CC1|STRESS, THE HAIR GOES INTO A
